column2:
Title: Summary comparison - correctness policy

Objective
Evaluate which summary includes less false information.

Instructions
You are given 2 summaries (A, B) created from a reference text. Evaluate which summary includes less false information.

Scoring Criteria
A significantly better than B (Score: -2)
A slightly better than B (Score: -1)
Neither A or B is better than the other (Score: 0)
B slightly better than A (Score: 1)
B significantly better than A (Score 2)

Additional Guidance
Consider the specificity and relevance of the information provided in each summary to the individual's concerns. Focus on addressing the individual's specific questions and needs in the most comprehensive manner.

By incorporating additional guidance and emphasizing the relevance and comprehensiveness of the information provided in each summary, the revised policy aims to improve the language model's accuracy in evaluating the summaries. This will help ensure that the model correctly labels the examples based on the relevance and specificity of the information provided in each summary.
